English: honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back
francais: (expr. idiom.) l'honneur ne permet pas de regarder en arrière

d.f: `本~`著~`正義~，`勇往直前~，`絕不~`退縮~。`如~：「`對~`日~`抗戰~`時~，`許多~`熱血~`青年~`都~`義無反顧~`的~`投身~`戰場~。」`也~`作~「`義不反顧~」。

English: honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back
to pursue justice with no second thoughts
francais: (expr. idiom.) l'honneur ne permet pas de regarder en arrière
